The first training workshop for the agricultural project
4  February,  2024
In partnership with Plaza Hollandi, the official sponsor of the agricultural project within the (My Project initiative2024), which is scheduled to be held during February 2024, Best Buddies Qatar organized the first training workshop entitled (cutting and arranging flowers / preparing bouquets of flowers), and 25 members of the Citizen chapter participated in the training workshop accompanied by members of their families. It is worth mentioning that the agricultural project includes 8 various training workshops aimed at providing them with the necessary skills that enable them to establish a small agricultural investment project at the end of the trainings with the support of Plaza Hollandi.
